name: Distraught Ground
description:
Distraught Ground

Fight your way through enemies to take down the corrupt monarch.

This is a short game that only contains one level with one boss. I'd appreciate feedback on gameplay and difficulty which you can comment here or dm me on twitter if you have time :)

Thanks for checking this out!

Controls 

WASD/ARROWS to move

K/SPACE to jump

J/C To attack

Credits

All gameplay, art and sound done by me

I post updates on twitter if you want to follow samlowercase

Menu font is from Humble Fonts by Evee Somepx
